name: Omega Legends
summary: Omega Legends is a sci-fi battle royale shooter set in the near future where the game known as "Ω" has taken the world by storm! Select a Hero and make use of their abilities to defeat the competition. Choose to fight alone or team up with friends in intense battles with one hundred participants. Hunt down enemies, build defenses, or take a stealthy approach, do whatever it takes to be the last one standing!
